title: Ep 39: Optimism - Why Bother?
description: My friend Dave Reinitz and I discuss optimism and why bother trying to be an optimist? I mean wasn't Pollyana the most annoying person ever? Should we even want to have expectations and what is the value of having a positive attitude? Also, why does Dave hate Dick Cheney so much?
author: nadav@ymhstudios.com (Christina Pazsitzky)
